items.preText: West Indies need 61 off 54. If Hope stays till the end, they can get it. But he needs someone to stay with him
items.text: digs this in short, and it goes above Hope's head. Called wide. Marginal, but fair
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 wide

items.text: short again, but not rising as high. Rocks on to the back foot and pulls it through midwicket for a four
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: short ball again but bowled into the body. Very well played by Hope, who tucks it towards midwicket with soft hands, so that they can run two
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: slower ball, ends up as a full toss, he opens the face to glide it to third man
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: short ball again outside off, pulled down in front of square to deep square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Paul, 1 run

items.text: fuller ball, flicked to deep square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: bouncer on target Gets it right this time, rising just enough to whistle past his head and completely defeat his intended pull. The batsman thought he'll get a wide, but this was legal. Ooh replays show that it went over his helmet actually. Maybe that should have been a wide. Lucky break for Bangladesh
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Paul, no run

items.text: fuller ball angling into the pads, worked to deep square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: came back with the arm and kept low, almost caught him on the crease, but Paul got his bat down in time while stepping away to keep it from hitting the stumps
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, no run

items.text: takes a step forward to defend
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, no run

items.text: doesn't get hold of that either. quicker and flatter, tried to step away again but only under-edges it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, no run

items.text: stays in his crease that time, and steers it towards point. Still no run
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, no run

items.text: comes forward to defend solidly. Only one run off that over
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, no run

items.preText: Dilip: "Shai played two gem of an innings against india in his last series but unfortunately could'nt take his side home,really hoping here he will finish the game."
items.text: goes deep in his crease to flick this to deep square
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: dropped, but a fine effort It was a matter of time before Paul went for it. He got down to slog sweep, got a top edge that flew towards midwicket. The fielder running in dived forward and got hands to it, but couldn't hold on. Nazmul was the fielder
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Paul, 1 run

items.text: pushed to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: flatter, pushed towards point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Paul, no run

items.text: stays back and tucks it to fine leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Paul, 1 run

items.text: reverse sweep connects well and they run hard to complete two
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 2 runs

items.preText: Animated discussion between Mushfiqur and Shakib. Mehidy part of the talks too. Shakib will bowl to Paul though. No apparently not. They're giving it to Mustafizur now. I wonder why. Shakib had Paul in sorts of trouble last over
items.text: angled across Paul who just hangs his bat. Had no clue about the off-cutter. Good length so it passes the bat perfectly
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, no run

items.text: goes a bit shorter and that rises up to chest high. Paul just about manages to tap it down and they take a quick single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, 1 run

items.text: brilliant shot moves across his stumps, used the pace to pick it up from outside off to lift it over fine leg.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: made as if to move across again but stayed still eventually, driving this full ball to deep cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: too full, but wide of off, angling across, he chops it to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, no run

items.text: angles across him again. Short of a length that time, and Paul is left looking lost again as he tries, and fails, to lay bat on ball with an attempted steer
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, no run
